code: import{ADD_NEW_MESSAGE,FETCHED_MESSAGES,DELETE_MESSAGE,SHOW_EDIT,EDIT_MESSAGE,HIDE_EDIT}from'./actionsType';export var addMessage=function addMessage(data){return{type:ADD_NEW_MESSAGE,payload:data};};export var deleteMessage=function deleteMessage(id){return{type:DELETE_MESSAGE,payload:id};};export var addFetchedMessage=function addFetchedMessage(data){return{type:FETCHED_MESSAGES,payload:data};};export var showEdit=function showEdit(){var id=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:null;return{type:SHOW_EDIT,payload:id};};export var editMessage=function editMessage(data){return{type:EDIT_MESSAGE,payload:data};};export var hideEdit=function hideEdit(){return{type:HIDE_EDIT};};
